data.title: B Site Retake Haunt Tree From Spawn
data.description: Enable your team with this retake Haunt line up, as it'll clear most of the site and Lane. It will not scan Attackers tucked into the back site.

data.title: Lane to B Lobby + Tiles Haunt
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Haunt line up you can throw at any point in the game to gain information on Attackers towards the B side of the map.

data.title: Tree to A Site Spam Haunt
data.description: Spam Attackers executing the A Site with this Haunt line up, as both you and your teammates on site/Heaven can kill them on the run out.

data.title: Early Round A Main Haunt From Barrier
data.description: Use this Haunt line up to enable teammates making a play, or simply just to get information towards A Main.
